page.title: 13RECREATION IN KIRKSTALL
page.content: KIRKSTALL VALLEY PARK IS ANEW KIND OF CITY PARK BASED ON THE OPEN COUNTRYSIDE,PLAYING FIELDS,PARKLAND AND WOODLAND WHICH FOLLOW THE COURSE OF THE RIVER AIRE TOWARDS THE CENTRE OF THE CITY. THE AIM IS TO CONSERVE AND IMPROVE THE VALLEY'S NATURAL BEAUTY, AND DEVELOP A WIDE RANGE OF LEISURE ACTIVITIES CLOSE TO WHERE PEOPLE LIVE. THESE INCLUDE A NETWORK OF INTERESTING WALKS, PICNIC AREAS, PLEASURE CRUISING ON THE CANAL, VISITS TO KIRKSTALL ABBEY, A FOLK MUSEUM AND INDUSTRIAL MUSEUM. THERE ARE FACILITIES FOR GOLF, BOWLING, FOOTBALL, RUGBY, CANOEING, TENNIS, FISHING, NATURE STUDY, AND MANY PLACES OF REFRESHMENT.IN ADDITION, A NEW INDOOR SPORTS CENTRE WAS OPENED IN 1985.IT INCLUDES A 12.5 BY 25 METRE SWIMMING POOL, LEARNER POOL,SPORTS HALL 4 SQUASH COURTS,
